name: web2js
description: Convert "Pascal" output of WEB into JavaScript

scripts.generate-wasm: tie -m tex.web texk/tex.web etexdir/etex.ch date.ch tex-final-end.ch inputln.ch tex.ch ord-chr.ch wordsize.ch expand-depth-count.ch && tangle -underline tex.web && node compile.js tex.p out.wasm
scripts.generate-core: npm run build && npm run generate-wasm && npm run asyncify-wasm && node initex.js

author: Jim Fowler
